title: Sunband Watch Face w Screen On
summary: Behold the blinding glare of the sun!
description: Witness the raw blinding power of the sun all in the sunglasses of a beautiful woman!This watchface flickers through all the colors of the light spectrum using the most accurate colors for each band.  It cycles in an erratic pattern based on the golden ratio.  The effect can be seen after looking long enough.  To help with this, a feature has been added in the settings menu to keep the watch face screen on indefinitely.  This can be switched back to normal.You can now go full blast with the flash effect in fullscreen to truly unleash the power of the sun!The watch face features 12 and 24 hour modes, a verbose date and the watch battery level.Disclaimer: Don't stare for too long, you might go blind.For all available watch faces, visit:  http://osthoro.wix.com/osthoro
descriptionHTML:
Witness the raw blinding power of the sun all in the sunglasses of a beautiful woman!

This watchface flickers through all the colors of the light spectrum using the most accurate colors for each band. It cycles in an erratic pattern based on the golden ratio. The effect can be seen after looking long enough. To help with this, a feature has been added in the settings menu to keep the watch face screen on indefinitely. This can be switched back to normal.

You can now go full blast with the flash effect in fullscreen to truly unleash the power of the sun!

The watch face features 12 and 24 hour modes, a verbose date and the watch battery level.

Disclaimer: Don't stare for too long, you might go blind.

For all available watch faces, visit: http://osthoro.wix.com/osthoro
